Example 1 (Sci-Fi):Â 
ALBUM: "The Dark Side of the Moon";Â

Example 2 (Movie/OST):Â 
ALBUM: "The Legend of 1900";Â

The black vinyl grooves of the record rise up to sculpt an intricate, miniature circular diorama representing the themes and imagery of the classic album {INSERT_ALBUM_NAME}. The landscape built from the grooves features {INSERT_SPECIFIC_SCENES_AND_ELEMENTS}. A tiny, detailed model of a {INSERT_NEEDLE_OBJECT} serves as the record needle, navigating the curving, canyon-like "roads" of the vinyl grooves. The record label in the center is clearly visible.
